fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, scout at a player’s house. Learn all of their visitors. Gain 1 Profit for each seen visitor that dies the same night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- None
Item: Crit-A-Cola
- Cost 1
- Uses 2
- Drink: Can be multitasked. Increase the power of any attacks you perform tonight by one stage.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
